Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Enhanced the install file to automatically update old and existing installations without losing local user-data.

English.Char_Desc_80: Ultra-modern Free Productivity Office Suite For All Computers And Tablets.
English.Char_Desc_250: It contains all the necessary software applications to get anyone started immediately... from a loan burdened student, an office worker on a budget, to even the casual home user. The interfaces have been optimised to be Touch-Device friendly.
English.Char_Desc_450: SSuite Lemon Juice contains all the necessary software applications to get anyone started immediately... from a loan burdened student, an office worker on a budget, to even the casual home user. The interfaces have been optimised to be Touch-Device friendly for easier access and operation. The interfaces have been optimised for easier access and operation, so no more menu structures to search through!
English.Char_Desc_2000:
It contains all the necessary software applications to get anyone started immediately... from a loan burdened student, an office worker on a budget, to even the casual home user...
The interfaces have been optimized to be Touch-Device friendly for easier access and operation.{ so no more menu structures! }. You also don't even have a need for .NET or even JAVA to be installed. This will save you a lot of hard drive space and precious computer resources... that means a much longer battery life and extended user-time... nice!
Strawberry Express Writer:
Use Strawberry Writer for anything from writing a quick letter to producing an entire book with embedded illustrations, tables of contents, indexes, and bibliographies. Strawberry Writer is a complete and powerful software solution for creating, editing and viewing various types of documents.
A number of available features give you a fine degree of control over the formatting of text, pages, sections of documents, and also entire documents. Insert special characters, emotional icons, pictures, and images into your writing for a more colourful display of your thoughts and ideas. Also included are a spell checker, mail merge editor, and an envelope printer.
Pineapple Express Spreadsheet:
This powerful spreadsheet has all the tools you need to calculate, analyze, summarize, and present your data in numerical reports or colourful graphics. A fully-integrated help system makes entering complex formulas a breeze.
Use the chart wizard to select from eight or more categories of 2-D and 3-D charts including line, area, column, pie, XY, stock and with dozens of variants. Whether you are producing financial reports or managing personal expenses, Pineapple spreadsheet gives you more efficiency and flexibility to accomplish your goals.
Minimum Requirements:
- 1024 x 768 Display Size - Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 and Beyond... x86 / x64
.
New Online Edition: https://desktop.ssuiteoffice.com/
.
